rpc.model.scoring
Class ModelScoring

java.lang.Object
  rpc.model.scoring.ModelScoring

public final class ModelScoring
extends java.lang.Object

Class that holds a collection of methods to analyze the results of running models.

Method Detail

getErrorCounts

public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getErrorCounts(Model trueModel,
                                                               Model learnedModel)
Compare true and learned models by computing the number of edges that are either true positives, false positives, true negatives, false negatives, directed in the wrong direction, undirected when should be directed, and directed correctly.

Parameters:
trueModel - the true model.
learnedModel - the learned model.
Returns:
a list of the counts of each type of error.

getSkeletonBreakdown

public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getSkeletonBreakdown(Model trueModel,
                                                                     Model learnedModel,
                                                                     double alpha,
                                                                     double strengthThresh)
Compare true and learned models at a finer granularity. For each dependency in the true model, this determines which edges were detected correctly, missed marginally, missed conditionally, insubstantive at the marginal level or insubstantive at the conditional level given the thresholds for significance and strength of effect.

Parameters:
trueModel - the true model.
learnedModel - the learned model.
alpha - the significance threshold.
strengthThresh - the strenth of effect threshold.
Returns:
a list of the counts of each type of error.

getSPrecision

public static double getSPrecision(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> errorCounts)
Compute the skeleton precision, which ignores the direction of edges.

Learned Skeleton correct / learned total edges.

Parameters:
errorCounts - the list of the counts of each type of error.
Returns:
the skeleton precision.

getSRecall

public static double getSRecall(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> errorCounts)
Compute the skeleton recall, which ignores the direction of edges.

Learned skeleton correct / true total edges.

Parameters:
errorCounts - the list of the counts of each type of error.
Returns:
the skeleton recall.

getCPrecision

public static double getCPrecision(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> errorCounts)
Compute the compelled precision, which uses the direction of edges.

Learned compelled correct / learned total compelled;

Parameters:
errorCounts - the list of the counts of each type of error.
Returns:
the compelled precision.

getCRecall

public static double getCRecall(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> errorCounts)
Compute the complled recall, which uses the direction of edges.

Learned compelled correct / true total compelled

Parameters:

Returns:
the compelled recall.

fSMeasure

public static double fSMeasure(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> errorCounts)
Compute the skeleton F measure.

2*skeleton precision*skeleton recall / (skeleton precision + skeleton recall)

Parameters:
errorCounts - the list of the counts of each type of error.
Returns:
the skeleton F measure.

fCMeasure

public static double fCMeasure(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> errorCounts)
Compute the compelled F measure.

2*compelled precision*compelled recall / (compelled precision + compelled recall)

Parameters:
errorCounts - the list of the counts of each type of error.
Returns:
the compelled F measure.

getOracleCRecall

public static double getOracleCRecall(ModelSupport modelSupport,
                                      Model trueModel)
Compute the compelled recall if the model oriented with a correct skeleton and conditional independence information.

Parameters:
modelSupport - data structure containing set of all units, dependencies, and potential causes.
trueModel - the true model.
Returns:
the compelled recall after the oracle orients the model.

usedRule

public static void usedRule(java.lang.String edgeOrientationRule)
Records that a given edge orientation rule was used.

Parameters:
edgeOrientationRule - the used edge orientation rule.

getEdgeRuleFrequencies

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getEdgeRuleFrequencies()
Get the number of times each edge orientation rule was used.

Returns:
a map of each edge orientation rule to the number of times it was used.
